bullets.text: Trump proposes $100,000 H-1B fee; separate order restricts some nonimmigrant entries, raising costs and tightening tech labor supply.
Congressional impasse heightens shutdown risk as Democrats block GOP stopgap, threatening near-term federal spending, growth and markets.
Trump, Xi report progress on TikTok deal; unresolved control concerns keep regulatory, national-security risk elevated.
Despite Fed rate cut, 10-year yields rose; Kashkari backs two more cuts, Miran sees limited tariff inflation.
SEC to propose rule change on quarterly earnings reporting, potentially reshaping disclosure cadence and investor information flow.
Treasury and IRS detail 'no tax on tips' deduction, altering incentives and take-home pay for service workers.
Gasoline prices expected to decline this fall, easing consumer inflation pressures and travel costs.
Panama Canal moves to recapture energy trade with LNG-focused capacity changes, potentially shifting global shipping routes and costs.
Paramount–Skydance eyes $22–$24 per-share bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, signaling consolidation pressure in media.
FDA approves new Keytruda injection, strengthening Merck’s oncology franchise and patent strategy.
Musk’s xAI reportedly raising $10B at $200B valuation, underscoring investor appetite for frontier AI.
Russian jets violated Estonian airspace, escalating NATO–Russia tensions and Baltic security risks.
Federal panel weakens Covid vaccine recommendations, framing shots as individual choice; access remains prescription-free.
Wildfire smoke could cause 70,000 U.S. deaths annually by 2050, highlighting climate-health costs of increased fire activity.
Microplastics discovered deep within human bones, raising concerns about long-term exposure and systemic health effects.
